description:
Despite Sanji`s attempt to warn him, Law finds his life in danger after being ambushed by Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Luffy is unable to hide his true identity once the fists start flying!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El engaño del siglo. ¡El turno de Doflamingo!
La conspiration du siècle. Doflamingo passe à l’action !
The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!
Схема века - Дофламинго приходит в движение
世紀の謀略 ドフラミンゴ動
